ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: The Oblitercons: What!?  Listen short one, we didn t sign on for an all out war!  We are to escort.  You d have to give us 450 kilograms of energon for that!

The Oblitercons:

"What!?  Listen short one, we didn't sign on for an all out war!  We are to 
escort.  You'd have to give us 450 kilograms of energon for that!" (450 kg = 
992 lbs) (Dark One yelled to Megatron)
"Not to mention...we are in a contract with that Transantulas fellow.  We are 
just to escort.  Not engage.  Unless we hear otherwise from him, that is all 
we will do.  If we meet anyone on the way we will fight, but not otherwise."

::All the other Oblitercons nodded::
